description:
Lickitung is a Normal type Pokémon that evolves into Lickilicky. Lickitung`s name is a combination of licking and tongue. Lickitung are known for their appetite as well as their extremely large tongue. A Lickitung can wrap an object or enemy with its tongue with ease and can swallow them it whole. Its tongue can also be used to paralyze its opponent.
In the Anime Team Rocket`s Jessie owned one until it was accidentally traded for her Wobbufet. Lickitung are the featured Pokémon of the Pokémon Stadium Mini Game Sushi Go-Round.
name: Beroringa
